about.title: NEVA FURNITURE
about.intro: Our first memory as Neva Furniture, our first experience of expressing ourselves, our first excitement, is the upholstery fabric and sofa mixed store we opened in 1990.
about.intro2: This small beginning made in the name of experience and expertise has remained as a pleasant memory in minds by giving way to 'NEVA' in the following years.
about.styleText: Style requires mastery. It shows itself in every detail of the design, from the chosen materials to the fabric, from the stitches to the finest lines. Style is bringing trends together with accumulation. Even directing them. Because everyone follows fashion... But what's important is to be followed.
about.styleText2: Style is both keeping up with the world and creating your own world. It's winking at tomorrow while catching today.
about.designText: Expectations, needs, and preferences change... But the power of style doesn't change. Because style attracts attention, influences, and inspires admiration. Style is much more than a beautiful design.
about.designText2: Style cannot be defined with words, but everyone who sees it recognizes it instantly. If you want to see it more closely; the address is our nearest store. Because...
about.designText3: The home fashion that progressed with its unique simplicity in the 90s gave way to modern lines in the following years, and the Turkish furniture industry managed to reach its deserved place in world markets.
about.whyUsText: Our consumers can be informed about our products through our regularly published catalogs and organized fabric cards each year, and benefit from their ideas and experiences.
about.whyUsText2: With a quarter-century of knowledge, experience, and effectiveness in the sector; NEVA works with the general principles of aesthetic perspective, ergonomic use, and new trends, keeping up with every development required by the age.
